TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebClient extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 提供用于将数据发送到由 URI 标识的资源及从这样的资源接收数据的常用方法。

span.span: Provides common methods for sending data to and receiving data from a resource identified by a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不建议使用`WebClient`类进行新的开发。We don't recommend that you use the `WebClient` class for new development. 而应使用类。Instead, use the class. 类提供用于向由 URI 标识的任何本地、intranet 或 Internet 资源发送数据或从其接收数据的常用方法。The class provides common methods for sending data to or receiving data from any local, intranet, or Internet resource identified by a URI. 类使用类提供对资源的访问权限。The class uses the class to provide access to resources. 实例可以使用通过方法注册的任何子代来访问数据。 instances can access data with any descendant registered with the method. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下, .NET Framework 支持`http:`以、 `https:`、 `ftp:`和`file:`方案标识符开头的 uri。By default, the .NET Framework supports URIs that begin with `http:`, `https:`, `ftp:`, and `file:` scheme identifiers. 下表介绍用于将数据上载到资源的方法。The following table describes methods for uploading data to a resource. |方法Method|说明Description| |------------|-----------------| ||检索用于将数据发送到资源的。Retrieves a used to send data to the resource.| ||检索用于将数据发送到资源的, 而不阻止调用线程。Retrieves a used to send data to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||将字节数组发送到资源, 并返回包含任何响应的数组。Sends a byte array to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||向资源发送数组, 而不阻止调用线程。 Sends a array to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||向资源发送本地文件, 并返回包含任何响应的数组。Sends a local file to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||向资源发送本地文件, 而不阻止调用线程。Sends a local file to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||向资源发送, 并返回包含任何响应的数组。 Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||向资源发送并返回包含任何响应的数组, 而不阻止调用线程。 Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response, without blocking the calling thread.| ||将发送到资源, 而不阻止调用线程。Sends a to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||将发送到资源, 而不阻止调用线程。Sends a to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 下表描述了用于从资源下载数据的方法。The following table describes methods for downloading data from a resource. |方法Method|说明Description| |------------|-----------------| ||以的形式返回资源中的数据。Returns the data from a resource as a .| ||返回资源中的数据, 而不阻止调用线程。Returns the data from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||从资源下载数据并返回一个数组。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array.| ||从资源下载数据并返回数组, 而不阻止调用线程。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array, without blocking the calling thread.| ||将数据从资源下载到本地文件。Downloads data from a resource to a local file.| ||将数据从资源下载到本地文件, 而不会阻止调用线程。Downloads data from a resource to a local file, without blocking the calling thread.| ||从资源下载, 并返回。 Downloads a from a resource and returns a .| ||从资源下载, 而不阻止调用线程。Downloads a from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 您可以使用方法取消尚未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 默认情况下,实例不发送可选的HTTP标头。A instance does not send optional HTTP headers by default. 如果您的请求需要一个可选的标头, 则必须将该标头添加到集合中。If your request requires an optional header, you must add the header to the collection. 例如, 若要在响应中保留查询, 则必须添加用户代理标头。For example, to retain queries in the response, you must add a user-agent header. 此外, 如果缺少用户代理标头, 服务器可能会返回 500 (内部服务器错误)。Also, servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the user agent header is missing. 在实例中`true` 设置为。 is set to `true` in instances. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用资源的 URI, 检索该资源并显示响应。The following code example takes the URI of a resource, retrieves it, and displays the response. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/CPP/useragent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/CS/useragent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/VB/useragent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数创建类的新实例。The parameterless constructor creates a new instance of the class. 默认 HTTP 方法为 GET。The default HTTP method is GET. 默认 FTP 方法为 RETR。The default FTP method is RETR. 默认的 为 。The default is . 的默认值为 `true`。The default value of is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个实例, 然后使用它从服务器下载数据并将其显示在系统控制台上, 从服务器下载数据并将其写入文件, 并将窗体值上载到服务器并接收响应。The following code example creates a instance and then uses it to download data from a server and display it on the system console, to download data from a server and write it to a file, and to upload form values to a server and receive the response. [!code-cpp[WebClient#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient/CPP/webclient.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient/CS/webclient.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient/VB/webclient.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对从某一 实例的 Internet 资源读取的数据进行缓冲处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer the data read from the Internet resource for a instance.

value.span: 如果为 ，则启用对从 Internet 资源接收的数据进行缓冲处理；如果为 ，则禁用缓冲处理。

span.span: to enable buffering of the data received from the Internet resource; to disable buffering.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性为`true`时, 将在内存中缓冲数据, 以使应用程序可以读取数据。 When the property is `true`, the data is buffered in memory so it is ready to be read by the app.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对写入到 实例的 Internet 资源的数据进行缓冲处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer the data written to the Internet resource for a instance.

value.span: 允许对写入到 Internet 资源的数据进行缓冲处理； 禁用缓冲处理。

span.span: to enable buffering of the data written to the Internet resource; to disable buffering.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性为`true`时, 将在内存中缓冲数据, 以便可以更有效地将数据写入更大块的 Internet 资源。 When the property is `true`, the data is buffered in memory so it can be written more efficiently to the Internet resource in larger chunks.

summary.span: 获取或设置 发出请求的基 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the base URI for requests made by a .

value.span: ，包含 请求的基 URI；如果尚未指定基地址，则为 。

span.span: A containing the base URI for requests made by a or if no base address has been specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含与相对地址组合在一起的基 URI。The property contains a base URI that is combined with a relative address. 当调用用于上传或下载数据的方法时, 对象会将此基本 URI 与在方法调用中指定的相对地址组合在一起。When you call a method that uploads or downloads data, the object combines this base URI with the relative address you specify in the method call. 如果指定一个绝对 URI, 则不使用属性值。If you specify an absolute URI, does not use the property value. 若要删除以前设置的值, 请将此`null`属性设置为或空字符串 ("")。To remove a previously set value, set this property to `null` or an empty string (""). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从 Internet 服务器下载数据, 并将其显示在控制台上。The following code example downloads data from an Internet server and displays it on the console. 它假定服务器的地址 (例如http://www.contoso.com) , 在中`hostUri` , 资源的路径 (如/default.htm) 在中`uriSuffix`。It assumes that the server's address (such as http://www.contoso.com) is in `hostUri` and that the path to the resource (such as /default.htm) is in `uriSuffix`. [!code-cpp[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/CPP/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/CS/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/VB/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消一个挂起的异步操作。

span.span: Cancels a pending asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果操作挂起, 则此方法将对基础调用。If an operation is pending, this method calls on the underlying . 调用时, 应用程序仍会接收与操作关联的完成事件。When you call , your application still receives the completion event associated with the operation. 例如, 当你调用以取消操作时, 如果已为事件指定事件处理程序, 则事件处理程序将收到操作已结束的通知。For example, when you call to cancel a operation, if you have specified an event handler for the event, your event handler receives notification that the operation has ended. 若要了解操作是否已成功完成, 请检查传递到事件处理程序的事件数据对象中的基类的属性。To learn whether the operation completed successfully, check the property on the base class of in the event data object passed to the event handler. 如果没有正在进行的异步操作, 则此方法不执行任何操作。If no asynchronous operation is in progress, this method does nothing.

summary.span: 获取或设置发送到主机并用于对请求进行身份验证的网络凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets the network credentials that are sent to the host and used to authenticate the request.

value.span: 一个 ，包含该请求的身份验证凭据。

span.span: An containing the authentication credentials for the request.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用于访问主机上的资源的身份验证凭据。The property contains the authentication credentials used to access a resource on a host. 在大多数客户端方案中, 应使用, 这是当前已登录用户的凭据。In most client-side scenarios, you should use the , which are the credentials of the currently logged on user. 为此, 请将属性设置为`true` , 而不是设置此属性。To do this, set the property to `true` instead of setting this property. 如果类正用于中间层应用程序 (如 ASP.NET 应用程序), 则属于运行 ASP 页 (服务器端凭据) 的帐户。 If the class is being used in a middle tier application, such as an ASP.NET application, the belong to the account running the ASP page (the server-side credentials). 通常情况下, 会将此属性设置为代表其发出请求的客户端的凭据。Typically, you would set this property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. 出于安全原因, 在自动重定向后, 将需要包含在重定向中的凭据存储在中 , 并将其分配给此属性。For security reasons, when automatically following redirects, store the credentials that you want to be included in the redirect in a and assign it to this property. 如果此属性包含除之外的`null` 任何内容, 则此属性将在重定向时自动设置为。This property will automatically be set to `null` upon redirection if it contains anything except a . 在这些条件下, 将此属性`null`值自动设置为会阻止将凭据发送到任何意外的目标。Having this property value be automatically set to `null` under those conditions prevents credentials from being sent to any unintended destination. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用用户的系统凭据来对请求进行身份验证。The following code example uses the user's system credentials to authenticate a request. [!code-cpp[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/CPP/webclientauth.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/CS/webclientauth.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/VB/webclientauth.vb#1)]

param.name: address
param.span: 从中下载数据的 URI。

span.span: The URI from which to download data.

summary.span: 从指定 URI 下载资源作为 数组。

span.span: Downloads the resource as a array from the URI specified.

returns.span: 一个 数组，其中包含下载的资源。

span.span: A array containing the downloaded resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用`address`参数指定的 URI 下载资源。 The method downloads the resource with the URI specified by the `address` parameter. 此方法在下载资源时阻止。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下载资源并在等待服务器响应时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例请求服务器中的数据, 并显示返回的数据。The following code example requests data from a server and displays the data returned. 它假定`remoteUri`包含所请求数据的有效 URI。It assumes that `remoteUri` contains a valid URI for the requested data. [!code-cpp[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/CPP/webclient_downloaddata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/CS/webclient_downloaddata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/VB/webclient_downloaddata.vb#1)]

An error occurred while downloading data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用与中`address`指定的 URI 方案关联的协议的默认方法检索指定的资源。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in `address`. 使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源异步下载数据。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 此方法在下载资源时不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while downloading the resource. 若要下载资源并在等待服务器响应时阻止, 请使用其中一种方法。To download a resource and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 下载完成后, 会引发事件。When the download completes, the event is raised. 应用程序必须处理此事件才能接收通知。Your application must handle this event to receive notification. 已下载的数据在属性中可用。The downloaded data is available in the property. 您可以使用方法取消尚未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用与中`address`指定的 URI 方案关联的协议的默认方法检索指定的资源。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in `address`. 使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源异步下载数据。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 此方法在下载资源时不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while downloading the resource. 若要下载资源并在等待服务器响应时阻止, 请使用其中一种方法。To download a resource and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 下载完成后, 会引发事件。When the download completes, the event is raised. 应用程序必须处理此事件才能接收通知。Your application must handle this event to receive notification. 已下载的数据在属性中可用。The downloaded data is available in the property. 您可以使用方法取消尚未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 下载数据资源后, 将完成返回的对象。The returned object will complete after the data resource has been downloaded. 此方法使用与`address`参数中指定的 URI 方案关联的协议的默认方法检索指定的资源。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in the `address` parameter. 使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源异步下载数据。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 下面的代码示例请求服务器中的数据, 并显示返回的数据。The following code example requests data from a server and displays the data returned. 它假定`remoteUri`包含所请求数据的有效 URI。It assumes that `remoteUri` contains a valid URI for the requested data.

summary.span: 将具有指定 URI 的资源下载到本地文件。

span.span: Downloads the resource with the specified URI to a local file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从`address`参数中指定的 URI 下载到本地文件数据。 The method downloads to a local file data from the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 此方法在下载资源时阻止。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下载资源并在等待服务器响应时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 在中间层应用程序中使用此方法时, 例如 ASP.NET 页, 如果执行应用程序的帐户没有访问该文件的权限, 则会收到错误。When using this method in a middle tier application, such as an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account under which the application executes does not have permission to access the file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将文件从http://www.contoso.com下载到本地硬盘驱动器。The following code example downloads a file from http://www.contoso.com to the local hard drive. [!code-cpp[WebClient_DownloadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadFile/CPP/webclient_downloadfile.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_DownloadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadFile/CS/webclient_downloadfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_DownloadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadFile/VB/webclient_downloadfile.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在`address`参数中由指定的 URI 处下载资源。This method downloads the resource at the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 下载成功完成后, 会在本地计算机上对`fileName`下载的文件进行命名。When the download completes successfully, the downloaded file is named `fileName` on the local computer. 文件使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步下载。The file is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要在文件可用时接收通知, 请向事件添加事件处理程序。To receive notification when the file is available, add an event handler to the event. 在下载资源时, 此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the resource is being downloaded. 若要在等待下载完成时阻止, 请使用其中一种方法。To block while waiting for the download to complete, use one of the methods. 您可以使用方法取消尚未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`未指定绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 在 ASP.NET 页中使用此方法时, 如果所执行的帐户不具有访问本地文件的权限, 则会收到错误。When using this method in an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account that the page executes under does not have permission to access the local file.

summary.span: 将具有指定 URI 的资源下载到本地文件。

span.span: Downloads, to a local file, the resource with the specified URI.

summary.span: 此方法不会阻止调用线程。

span.span: This method does not block the calling thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在`address`参数中由指定的 URI 处下载资源。This method downloads the resource at the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 下载成功完成后, 会在本地计算机上对`fileName`下载的文件进行命名。When the download completes successfully, the downloaded file is named `fileName` on the local computer. 文件使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步下载。The file is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要在文件可用时接收通知, 请向事件添加事件处理程序。To receive notification when the file is available, add an event handler to the event. 在下载资源时, 此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the resource is being downloaded. 若要在等待下载完成时阻止, 请使用其中一种方法。To block while waiting for the download to complete, use one of the methods. 您可以使用方法取消尚未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`未指定绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 在 ASP.NET 页中使用此方法时, 如果所执行的帐户不具有访问本地文件的权限, 则会收到错误。When using this method in an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account that the page executes under does not have permission to access the local file.

summary.span: 在异步文件下载操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous file download operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次异步文件下载操作完成时都会引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous file download operation completes. 异步文件下载通过调用方法来启动。Asynchronous file downloads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类向事件处理程序提供事件数据。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为此事件设置事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 下载数据资源后, 将完成返回的对象。The returned object will complete after the data resource has been downloaded. 此方法在`address`参数中由指定的 URI 处下载资源。This method downloads the resource at the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 下载成功完成后, 会在本地计算机上对`fileName`下载的文件进行命名。When the download completes successfully, the downloaded file is named `fileName` on the local computer. 文件使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步下载。The file is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 您可以使用方法取消尚未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`未指定绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 在 ASP.NET 页中使用此方法时, 如果所执行的帐户不具有访问本地文件的权限, 则会收到错误。When using this method in an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account that the page executes under does not have permission to access the local file.

summary.span: 在异步下载操作成功传输部分或全部数据后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous download operation successfully transfers some or all of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在每次异步下载执行进度时引发。This event is raised each time an asynchronous download makes progress. 使用以下任一方法启动下载时, 将引发此事件。This event is raised when downloads are started using any of the following methods. |方法Method|说明Description| |------------|-----------------| ||从资源下载数据并返回数组, 而不阻止调用线程。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array, without blocking the calling thread.| ||将数据从资源下载到本地文件, 而不会阻止调用线程。Downloads data from a resource to a local file, without blocking the calling thread.| ||返回资源中的数据, 而不阻止调用线程。Returns the data from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类向事件处理程序提供事件数据。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 被动 FTP 文件传输将始终显示进度百分比为零, 因为服务器未发送文件大小。A passive FTP file transfer will always show a progress percentage of zero, since the server did not send the file size. 若要显示进度, 可以通过重写虚拟方法将 FTP 连接更改为活动:To show progress, you can change the FTP connection to active by overriding the virtual method: ```csharp internal class MyWebClient : WebClient { protected override WebRequest GetWebRequest(Uri address) { FtpWebRequest req = (FtpWebRequest)base.GetWebRequest(address); req.UsePassive = false; return req; } } ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为此事件设置事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#19)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#19)] 下面的代码示例演示了此事件的处理程序的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#42)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#42)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#42)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索指定的资源。This method retrieves the specified resource. 下载资源后, 该方法将使用在属性中指定的编码将资源转换为。After it downloads the resource, the method uses the encoding specified in the property to convert the resource to a . 此方法在下载资源时阻止。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下载资源并在等待服务器响应时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 资源使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源异步下载。The resource is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 下载资源后, 此方法将使用在属性中指定的编码将资源转换为。After downloading the resource, this method uses the encoding specified in the property to convert the resource to a . 此方法在下载资源时不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while downloading the resource. 若要下载资源并在等待服务器响应时阻止, 请使用方法。To download a resource and block while waiting for the server's response, use the method. 下载完成后, 会引发事件。When the download completes, the event is raised. 应用程序必须处理此事件才能接收通知。Your application must handle this event to receive notification. 下载的字符串在属性中提供。The downloaded string is available in the property. 您可以使用方法取消尚未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置与请求关联的标头名称/值对集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of header name/value pairs associated with the request.

value.span: 一个 ，包含与此请求关联的标头名称/值对。

span.span: A containing header name/value pairs associated with this request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个实例, 该实例包含与请求一起发送的协议标头。 The property contains a instance containing protocol headers that the sends with the request. 某些常用标头被视为受限制, 并受系统保护, 无法在对象中设置或更改。Some common headers are considered restricted and are protected by the system and cannot be set or changed in a object. 尝试发送 请求时, 任何在与对象关联的对象中设置其中一个受限制的标头的尝试都将引发异常。Any attempt to set one of these restricted headers in the object associated with a object will throw an exception later when attempting to send the request. 受限制的系统标头包括但不限于以下各项:Restricted headers protected by the system include, but are not limited to the following: - 日期Date - HostHost 此外, 在使用对象时, 还限制了其他一些标头。In addition, some other headers are also restricted when using a object. 这些受限制的标头包括但不限于以下各项:These restricted headers include, but are not limited to the following: - 接受Accept - 连接Connection - Content-lengthContent-Length - 预期 (当该值设置为 "100-continue" 时)Expect (when the value is set to "100-continue" - If-已修改-自If-Modified-Since - 范围Range - 传输编码Transfer-Encoding 类具有设置上述一些标头的属性。The class has properties for setting some of the above headers. 如果对应用程序设置这些标头很重要, 则应使用类, 而不是类。If it is important for an application to set these headers, then the class should be used instead of the class. 不应假定标头值保持不变, 因为 Web 服务器和缓存可能会更改或向 Web 请求添加标头。You should not assume that the header values will remain unchanged, because Web servers and caches may change or add headers to a Web request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用集合将 HTTP `Content-Type`标头`application/x-www-form-urlencoded,`设置为, 以通知服务器窗体数据已附加到 post。The following code example uses the collection to set the HTTP `Content-Type` header to `application/x-www-form-urlencoded,` to notify the server that form data is attached to the post. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/CPP/webclient_uploaddata_headers.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/CS/webclient_uploaddata_headers.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/VB/webclient_uploaddata_headers.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此类继承的类可以重写此方法, 以便在事件发生时执行其他任务。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了此方法的一个实现, 该实现可由派生自的类进行自定义。The following code example shows an implementation of this method that can be customized by a class derived from . summary.span: 为从具有指定 URI 的资源下载的数据打开一个可读的流。

span.span: Opens a readable stream for the data downloaded from a resource with the specified URI.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Stream OpenRead (string address);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Stream OpenRead(string address) cil managed
Public Function OpenRead (address As String) As Stream
public: System::IO::Stream ^ OpenRead(System::String ^ address);
member this.OpenRead : string -> System.IO.Stream

param.name: address
param.span: 以 形式指定的 URI，将从中下载数据。

span.span: The URI specified as a from which to download data.

summary.span: 为从具有 指定的 URI 的资源下载的数据打开一个可读的流。

span.span: Opens a readable stream for the data downloaded from a resource with the URI specified as a .

returns.span: 一个 ，用于从资源读取数据。

span.span: A used to read data from a resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个实例, 该实例用于读取`address`参数指定的资源的内容。 The method creates a instance used to read the contents of the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 此方法在打开流时阻止。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要在等待流时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不`null`为, 则将其追加到`address`。 If the property is not `null`, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当完成 时, 必须调用以避免系统资源不足。You must call when finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开由`uriString`标识的资源并在系统控制台上显示结果。The following code example opens the resource identified by `uriString` and displays the results on the system console. 请注意, 在读取数据时, 由返回的会关闭。Note that the returned by is closed when the data has been read. [!code-cpp[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/CPP/webclient_openread.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/CS/webclient_openread.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/VB/webclient_openread.vb#1)]

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 通过组合 和 所构成的 URI 无效。

span.span: The URI formed by combining , is invalid.
-or-
An error occurred while downloading data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个实例, 该实例用于读取`address`参数指定的资源的内容。 The method creates a instance used to read the contents of the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 此方法在打开流时阻止。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要在等待流时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不`null`为, 则将其追加到`address`。 If the property is not `null`, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当完成 时, 必须调用以避免系统资源不足。You must call when finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. **注意**当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪时, 此成员将输出跟踪信息。**Note** This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回用于将数据发送到资源的可写流。The method returns a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 此方法在打开流时阻止。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要在等待流时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从命令行读取数据, 并使用获取用于写入数据的流。The following code example reads data from the command line and uses to obtain a stream for writing the data. 请注意, 在发送数据后, 返回的被关闭。Note that the returned by is closed after the data is sent. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回用于将数据发送到资源的可写流。The method returns a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 基础请求是通过`method`参数中指定的方法发出的。The underlying request is made with the method specified in the `method` parameter. 关闭流时, 会将数据发送到服务器。The data is sent to the server when you close the stream. 此方法在打开流时阻止。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要在等待流时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. `method`如果参数指定的方法不能被服务器识别, 则基础协议类将确定发生的情况。If the `method` parameter specifies a method that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常, 引发 , 并将属性设置为指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`未指定绝对地址, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute address, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从命令行读取数据, 并使用来获取用于写入数据的流。The following code example reads data from the command line and uses to obtain a stream used to write the data. 请注意, 必须关闭返回的, 才能发送数据。Note that the returned by must be closed to send the data. [!code-cpp[WebClient_OpenWrite#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenWrite/CPP/webclient_openwrite.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_OpenWrite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenWrite/CS/webclient_openwrite.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_OpenWrite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenWrite/VB/webclient_openwrite.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索用于将数据发送到资源的可写流。This method retrieves a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 使用从线程池自动分配的线程资源来检索流。The stream is retrieved using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要在流可用时接收通知, 请向事件添加事件处理程序。To receive notification when the stream is available, add an event handler to the event. 关闭流时, 将阻止线程, 直到将请求发送到`address` , 并收到响应。When you close the stream, the thread blocks until the request is sent to `address` and a response is received. 当打开流时, 此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is being opened. 若要在等待流时阻止, 请使用其中一种方法。To block while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次打开用于将数据发送到资源的流的异步操作完成时, 都会引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous operation to open a stream that is used to send data to a resource completes. 这些操作通过调用方法来启动。These operations are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类向事件处理程序提供事件数据。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为此事件设置事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 在打开数据资源的可写流后, 返回的对象将完成。The returned object will complete after the a writable stream to the data resource has been opened. 当流打开时, 此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is opening. 此方法检索用于将数据写入到`address`参数指定的资源的实例。This method retrieves a instance used to write data to the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 使用从线程池自动分配的线程资源来获取流。The stream is obtained using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. > [!NOTE] > 完成后, 必须调用以避免系统资源不足。You must call when you are finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. `method`如果参数指定的方法不能被服务器识别, 则基础协议类将确定发生的情况。If the `method` parameter specifies a method that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常, 引发 , 并将属性设置为指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将数据缓冲区发送到资源。The method sends a data buffer to a resource. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 如果服务器不理解基础请求, 则基础协议类将确定发生的情况。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常, 引发 , 并将属性设置为指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 方法将的`data`内容发送到服务器而不对其进行编码。 The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. 上载数据时, 此方法会阻止。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要在等待服务器响应时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将从控制台输入的字符串转换为数组, 并使用将数组发送到指定的服务器。The following code example converts a string entered from the console to a array and posts the array to the specified server using . 服务器的任何响应都会显示到控制台。Any response from the server is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/CPP/webclient_uploaddata2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/CS/webclient_uploaddata2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/VB/webclient_uploaddata2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用`method`参数中指定的 HTTP 方法将数据缓冲区发送到资源, 并返回来自服务器的任何响应。 The method sends a data buffer to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter, and returns any response from the server. 上载数据时, 此方法会阻止。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要在等待服务器响应时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 方法将的`data`内容发送到服务器而不对其进行编码。 The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. `method`如果参数指定了服务器无法理解的谓词, 则基础协议类将确定发生的情况。If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常, 引发 , 并将属性设置为指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将从控制台输入的字符串转换为字节数组, 并使用将该数组发送到指定的服务器。The following code example converts a string entered from the console into a byte array and posts the array to the specified server using . 服务器的任何响应都会显示到控制台。Any response from the server is displayed to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用`method`参数中指定的 HTTP 方法将数据缓冲区发送到资源, 并返回来自服务器的任何响应。 The method sends a data buffer to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter, and returns any response from the server. 上载数据时, 此方法会阻止。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要在等待服务器响应时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 方法将的`data`内容发送到服务器而不对其进行编码。 The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. `method`如果参数指定了服务器无法理解的谓词, 则基础协议类将确定发生的情况。If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常, 引发 , 并将属性设置为指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将数据缓冲区发送到资源。This method sends a data buffer to a resource. 数据缓冲区使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步发送。The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 数据不进行编码。The data is not encoded. 若要在数据上传完成时收到通知, 请向事件添加事件处理程序。To receive notification when the data upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 在发送数据时, 此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the data is being sent. 若要在等待服务器响应的同时发送数据和块, 请使用其中一种方法。To send data and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不是空字符串 (""), 并且`address`不包含绝对 uri, `address`则必须是与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。 If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次异步数据上传操作完成时都会引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous data upload operation completes. 异步数据上传通过调用方法来启动。Asynchronous data uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类向事件处理程序提供事件数据。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为此事件设置事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将数据缓冲区上载到资源后, 返回的对象将完成。The returned object will complete after the a data buffer has been uploaded to the resource. 此方法将数据缓冲区发送到资源。This method sends a data buffer to a resource. 数据缓冲区使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步发送。The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 数据不进行编码。The data is not encoded. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不是空字符串 (""), 并且`address`不包含绝对 uri, `address`则必须是与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。 If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

param.name: address
param.span: 接收文件的资源的 URI。

returns.span: 一个 数组，它包含来自资源的响应的正文。

span.span: A array containing the body of the response from the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将本地文件发送到资源。The method sends a local file to a resource. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 上传文件时, 此方法会阻止。This method blocks while uploading the file. 若要在等待服务器响应时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. `POST`方法由 HTTP 定义。The `POST` method is defined by HTTP. 如果基础请求不使用 HTTP, 并且`POST`服务器不理解该请求, 则基础协议类将确定发生的情况。If the underlying request does not use HTTP and `POST` is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常, 引发 , 并将属性设置为指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用将指定文件上载到指定的 URI。The following code example uploads the specified file to the specified URI using . 服务器返回的任何响应都会显示在控制台上。Any response returned by the server is displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile/CPP/webclient_uploadfile.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile/CS/webclient_uploadfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile/VB/webclient_uploadfile.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示一个 ASP.NET 页, 该页面可以接受已发布的文件并适合与方法一起使用。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that can accept posted files and is suitable for use with the method. 该页必须位于 Web 服务器上。The page must reside on a Web server. 其地址为`address` 方法的参数提供值。Its address provides the value for the `address` parameter of the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[NCLWebClientAsp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsp/CS/fileuploadercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[NCLWebClientAsp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsp/VB/fileuploadervb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Uploads the specified local file to the specified resource, using the POST method.

summary.span: 此方法不会阻止调用线程。

span.span: This method does not block the calling thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步发送。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要在文件上传完成时收到通知, 请向事件添加事件处理程序。To receive notification when the file upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 在发送文件时, 此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the file is being sent. 若要在等待服务器响应的同时发送文件和块, 请使用其中一种方法。To send a file and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果该属性不是空字符串 (""), 则`address`必须是与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

Public Custom Event UploadFileCompleted As UploadFileCompletedEventHandler
public: event System::Net::UploadFileCompletedEventHandler ^ UploadFileCompleted;
member this.UploadFileCompleted : System.Net.UploadFileCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 在异步文件上载操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous file-upload operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次异步文件上传操作完成时都会引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous file upload operation completes. 异步文件上传通过调用方法来启动。Asynchronous file uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类向事件处理程序提供事件数据。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为此事件设置事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将文件上载到资源后, 返回的对象将完成。The returned object will complete after the file has been uploaded to the resource. 文件使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步发送。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果该属性不是空字符串 (""), 则`address`必须是与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

param.span: 对于 HTTP 资源，此 URI 必须标识可以接受用 POST 方法发送的请求的资源，如脚本或 ASP 页。

span.span: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.

param.name: method
param.span: 用于将数据发送到资源的方法。

span.span: The method used to send the data to the resource.

param.span: 如果为 ，则对于 http 默认值为 POST，对于 ftp 默认值为 STOR。

span.span: If , the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要发送到资源的本地文件。

span.span: The local file to send to the resource.

summary.span: 使用任务对象将指定本地文件上载到资源以作为异步操作。

span.span: Uploads the specified local file to a resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 任务对象上的 属性将返回 数组，该数组包含在上载文件时从资源接收的响应的正文。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a array containing the body of the response received from the resource when the file was uploaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将文件上载到资源后, 返回的对象将完成。The returned object will complete after the file has been uploaded to the resource. 文件使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步发送。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果该属性不是空字符串 (""), 则`address`必须是与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 默认情况下, 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。BY default, this method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

Public Custom Event UploadProgressChanged As UploadProgressChangedEventHandler

member this.UploadProgressChanged : System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 在异步上载操作成功转换部分或全部数据后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous upload operation successfully transfers some or all of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在每次异步上载发生进度时引发。This event is raised each time an asynchronous upload makes progress. 使用以下任一方法启动上传时, 将引发此事件。This event is raised when uploads are started using any of the following methods. |方法Method|说明Description| |------------|-----------------| ||向资源发送数组, 而不阻止调用线程。 Sends a array to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||向资源发送本地文件, 而不阻止调用线程。Sends a local file to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||向资源发送并返回包含任何响应的数组, 而不阻止调用线程。 Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response, without blocking the calling thread.| 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类向事件处理程序提供事件数据。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为此事件设置事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在上传字符串之前, 此方法使用 属性中指定的编码将其转换为数组。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 传输字符串时, 此方法将会阻止。This method blocks while the string is transmitted. 若要发送字符串并在等待服务器响应时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To send a string and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果属性不是空字符串 (""), 并且`address`不包含绝对 uri, `address`则必须是与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。 If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将字符串发送到资源。This method sends a string to a resource. 该字符串使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步发送。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 在上传字符串之前, 此方法使用 属性中指定的编码将其转换为数组。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 若要在字符串上传完成时接收通知, 可以向事件添加事件处理程序。To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the event. 在发送字符串时, 此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要在等待服务器响应的同时发送字符串和块, 请使用其中一种方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将字符串发送到资源。This method sends a string to a resource. 该字符串使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步发送。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 在上传字符串之前, 此方法使用 属性中指定的编码将其转换为数组。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 若要在字符串上传完成时接收通知, 可以向事件添加事件处理程序。To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the event. 在发送字符串时, 此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要在等待服务器响应的同时发送字符串和块, 请使用其中一种方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在每次异步字符串上传操作完成时引发。This event is raised each time an asynchronous string upload operation completes. 异步字符串上载通过调用方法来启动。Asynchronous string uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类向事件处理程序提供事件数据。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为此事件设置事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 将字符串上载到资源后, 返回的对象将完成。The returned object will complete after the string has been uploaded to the resource. 该字符串使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步发送。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 在上传字符串之前, 此方法使用 属性中指定的编码将其转换为数组。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 传输字符串时, 此方法将会阻止。This method blocks while the string is transmitted. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将发送到服务器。The method sends a to a server. 上载数据时, 此方法会阻止。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要在等待服务器响应时继续执行, 请使用其中一种方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果服务器不理解基础请求, 则基础协议类将确定发生的情况。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常, 引发 , 并将属性设置为指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果 content-type 标头为`null`, 则此方法会将其设置为 "application/x-url 编码"。If the Content-type header is `null`, the method sets it to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从用户 (名称、年龄和地址) 收集信息, 并使用将值发送到服务器。The following code example gathers information from the user (name, age, and address) and posts the values to the server using . 来自服务器的任何响应都会显示在控制台上。Any response from the server is displayed on the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将字符串发送到资源。This method sends a string to a resource. 该字符串使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源进行异步发送。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 在上传字符串之前, 此方法使用 属性中指定的编码将其转换为数组。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 若要在字符串上传完成时接收通知, 可以向事件添加事件处理程序。To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the event. 在发送字符串时, 此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要在等待服务器响应的同时发送字符串和块, 请使用其中一种方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 使用指定的方法将指定的名称/值集合中的数据上载到由指定的 URI 标识的资源。

span.span: Uploads the data in the specified name/value collection to the resource identified by the specified URI, using the specified method.

summary.span: 此方法不会阻止调用线程，并允许调用方将对象传递给操作完成时所调用的方法。

span.span: This method does not block the calling thread, and allows the caller to pass an object to the method that is invoked when the operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将中包含的数据发送`address`到资源。This method sends the data contained in a to the `address` resource. 使用此方法将表单数据发送到 URI 进行处理。Use this method to send form data to a URI for processing. 使用 url 编码媒体类型发送数据;Content-type 标头值必须设置为 "application/x-url 编码"。The data is sent using the form-urlencoded media type; the Content-Type header value must be set to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 默认情况下, 标头是正确设置的。The header is set correctly by default. 如果使用集合中设置的不同 content-type 标头值调用此方法, 则方法将引发。 The methods throw a if you call this method with a different Content-Type header value set in the collection. 如果服务器`method`不理解该方法, 则基础协议类将确定发生的情况。If the `method` method is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常, 引发 , 并将属性设置为指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源来异步发送。The is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要在上传操作完成时收到通知, 请向事件添加事件处理程序。To receive notification when the upload operation completes, add an event handler to the event. 在发送字符串时, 此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要在等待服务器响应的同时发送字符串和块, 请使用其中一种方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不为空, 则将其追加`address`到。If the property is not empty, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在每次完成对象数据的异步上传时引发。This event is raised each time an asynchronous upload of a object's data completes. 这些上载通过调用方法来启动。These uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类向事件处理程序提供事件数据。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 在将名称/值集合上载到资源后, 返回的对象将完成。The returned object will complete after the name/value collection has been uploaded to the resource. 名称/值集合使用自动从线程池分配的线程资源异步发送。The name/value collection is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 使用方法可取消尚未完成的异步操作。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果服务器不理解基础请求, 则基础协议类将确定发生的情况。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常, 引发 , 并将属性设置为指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果 content-type 标头为`null`, 则此方法会将其设置为 "application/x-url 编码"。If the Content-type header is `null`, this method sets it to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 如果该属性不是空字符串 ("") 且`address`不包含绝对 uri, 则必须是`address`与组合的相对 uri, 才能形成所请求数据的绝对 uri。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果该属性不是空字符串, 则将其追加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 STOR 命令上传 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源, 使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值控制 是否随请求一起发送。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether the are sent with requests.

value.span: 如果使用默认凭据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the default credentials are used; otherwise .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此`true` 对象发出的请求应在服务器请求时使用当前登录用户的默认凭据进行身份验证, 请将此属性设置为。Set this property to `true` when requests made by this object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the default credentials of the currently logged on user. 对于客户端应用程序, 这在大多数情况下都是所需的行为。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 对于中间层应用程序 (如 ASP.NET 应用程序), 通常应将属性设置为代表其发出请求的客户端的凭据。For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性。The following code example demonstrates setting this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在使用写入流将数据写入资源的异步操作结束时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous operation to write data to a resource using a write stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用写入流将数据写入资源的异步操作关闭时, 将引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous operation used to write data to a resource using a write stream is closed. 这些操作通过调用方法得到。These operations result from calls to the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类向事件处理程序提供事件数据。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
